author: pbs.org
title: PBS NewsHour full episode October 19, 2015
text: Monday on the NewsHour, Slovenia reopens its border to migrants. Also: More Mideast unrest as Secretary of State John Kerry calls for peace, awaiting decisions from Joe Biden and Rep. Paul Ryan, VW owners left in limbo after the emissions scandal, Caron Butler and his rise to the NBA, seeking the children of Argentina’s “disappeared” and Yo-Yo Ma on music and life at 60.
